Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires assent of two-thirds of the members for any bill that enacts or increases tax revenues
Summary: Requires assent of two-thirds of the members for any bill that enacts or increases tax revenues.
LawCode: Amd ยง52, Leg L; add ยง1200, Tax L; amd ยง40, Munic Home R L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, the tax law and the municipal home rule law, in relation to requiring assent of two-thirds of the members for any bill that enacts or increases tax revenues
